books.author: by Glennon Doyle
books.description: The activist and public speaker describes her journey of listening to her inner voice.
books.name: UNTAMED

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: An examination of the leadership of the prime minister Winston Churchill.
books.name: THE SPLENDID AND THE VILE

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by Robert Kolker
books.description: From 1945 to 1965, a family in Colorado had 12 children, six of whom went on to develop schizophrenia.
books.name: HIDDEN VALLEY ROAD

books.author: by John M. Barry
books.description: An overview of the 1918 flu epidemic and cautionary tale for similar kinds of large-scale outbreaks.
books.name: THE GREAT INFLUENZA

books.author: by James Patterson and Cynthia Fagen
books.description: A look at the achievements of the political family and what has been called “the Kennedy curse.”
books.name: THE HOUSE OF KENNEDY

books.author: by Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady describes her journey from the South Side of Chicago to the White House, and how she balanced work, family and her husband’s political ascent.
books.name: BECOMING

books.author: by Val Kilmer
books.description: The actor recalls his career highlights, romances and the toll cancer has taken on his voice.
books.name: I'M YOUR HUCKLEBERRY

books.author: by Dan Crenshaw
books.description: The Texas congressman and former Navy SEAL prescribes ways to overcome adversity.
books.name: FORTITUDE

books.author: by Kobe Bryant
books.description: Various skills and techniques used on the court by the late Los Angeles Lakers player.
books.name: THE MAMBA MENTALITY

books.author: by Jonathan Karl
books.description: The ABC News chief White House correspondent gives his perspective on our current president and describes the shifts within their relationship.
books.name: FRONT ROW AT THE TRUMP SHOW

books.author: by Deborah Feldman
books.description: A woman breaks free of the Satmar Hasidic community in Brooklyn in which she was raised.
books.name: UNORTHODOX

books.author: by Sonia Purnell
books.description: The true story of a Baltimore socialite who joined a spy organization during World War II and became essential to the French Resistance.
books.name: A WOMAN OF NO IMPORTANCE

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.
books.name: SAPIENS

books.author: by Trevor Noah
books.description: A memoir about growing up biracial in apartheid South Africa by the host of “The Daily Show.”
books.name: BORN A CRIME
